about_the_game:
KardVenture is a fantasy survival card game where you assume the role of a renowned hero, braving a myriad of perils while exploring the realm of Vayandor. Establish and fortify your village to thwart an array of adversaries, spanning from feral goblins to formidable orcs and the mysterious undead.


Explore unique locations and uncover the secrets that wait inside. Find lost treasures, uncover secrets, encounter characters in need and face powerful enemies that want only to harm you.

Face many enemies belonging to a variety of factions, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Use items to counter the powerful blows your enemies unleash upon you and your village.

Gather resources and use them to raise your village. Build everything you need to cook food, craft items and to defend your village.

Improve your hero’s actions by increasing his main stats. Equip items to help him defeat enemies with ease. Gain powerful spells that make the difference when all hope is lost.

Use your village to get everything you need in your adventure. Craft items to equip your hero or cook food to increase his stats. Make hard defenses or forge new spells to aid you in battle.

Key Features:
  • Select the Hero you want to play as.
  • Stack cards to make them interact and discover new combos.
  • Explore location cards and see what your Hero finds.
  • Use resources to build your village or equip your Hero.
  • Interact with NPCs and even buy their loyalty to fight alongside your Hero.
  • Fight fierce foes like Orcs, Werewolves, Goblins, Bandits and the Undead.
  • Complete Quests and Events.
  • Gather Renown by performing deeds.
  • Earn enough Titles to win the game.

short_description: KardVenture is a survival card game where you play as a legendary hero. Explore mysterious locations, gather resources, build your village and face the challenges ahead, be it a cold blizzard or an orc raid. Stack cards to make combos, craft, build, fight and most important... SURVIVE!
